Strings.Text: {scroll 2}It seems someone has\nsearched here already...{clear 0}{scroll 2}It appears to be a switch...\nWill you push it?{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 2}There's something at the\nback of the shelf...
{scroll 0}\nWhat's going on?{scroll 1}{clear 60}{scroll 0}\nHow come you look so scared?{scroll 1}{timed 72}
{scroll 0}I've been thinking something\nis wrong with this house.{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}Hey! What is this?\nThere's a page missing.{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}Yeah, I thought \nabout that too.{scroll 1}{clear 85}{scroll 0}Perhaps that was\nthe most important part.{scroll 1}{timed 82}
{scroll 0}I think I'll stay and\nlook around more.{scroll 1}{timed 94}
